# esprinet-swagger-client

Esprinet Customer Rest Services
- API version: v2
  - Build date: 2020-12-17T15:47:59.649+01:00

No description provided (generated by Swagger Codegen https://github.com/swagger-api/swagger-codegen)


*Automatically generated by the [Swagger Codegen](https://github.com/swagger-api/swagger-codegen)*


## Requirements

Building the API client library requires:
1. Java 1.7+
2. Maven/Gradle

## Installation

To install the API client library to your local Maven repository, simply execute:

```shell
mvn clean install
```

To deploy it to a remote Maven repository instead, configure the settings of the repository and execute:

```shell
mvn clean deploy
```

Refer to the [OSSRH Guide](http://central.sonatype.org/pages/ossrh-guide.html) for more information.

### Maven users

Add this dependency to your project's POM:

```xml
<dependency>
  <groupId>org.lamemind</groupId>
  <artifactId>esprinet-swagger-client</artifactId>
  <version>1.0.0</version>
  <scope>compile</scope>
</dependency>
```

### Gradle users

Add this dependency to your project's build file:

```groovy
compile "org.lamemind:esprinet-swagger-client:1.0.0"
```

### Others

At first generate the JAR by executing:

```shell
mvn clean package
```

Then manually install the following JARs:

* `target/esprinet-swagger-client-1.0.0.jar`
* `target/lib/*.jar`

## Getting Started

Please follow the [installation](#installation) instruction and execute the following Java code:

```java

import org.lamemind.esprinetclient.invoker.*;
import org.lamemind.esprinetclient.invoker.auth.*;
import org.lamemind.esprinetclient.model.*;
import org.lamemind.esprinetclient.api.CashandcarriesApi;

import java.io.File;
import java.util.*;

public class CashandcarriesApiExample {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        
        CashandcarriesApi apiInstance = new CashandcarriesApi();
        String esprinetProductCode = "esprinetProductCode_example"; // String | The esprinet product code
        String customerProductCode = "customerProductCode_example"; // String | The customer product code
        String xConsumerTransactionId = "xConsumerTransactionId_example"; // String | Identifies the transaction at the consumer/client side (Optional).
        try {
            CashAndCarriesProductAvailabilityByCodeOutput result = apiInstance.cashAndCarryAvailabilityGet(esprinetProductCode, customerProductCode, xConsumerTransactionId);
            System.out.println(result);
        } catch (ApiException e) {
            System.err.println("Exception when calling CashandcarriesApi#cashAndCarryAvailabilityGet");
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
}

```

## Documentation for API Endpoints

All URIs are relative to *https://ws-uat.esprinet.com/b2b/api/v2.0*

Class | Method | HTTP request | Description
------------ | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
*CashandcarriesApi* | [**cashAndCarryAvailabilityGet**](docs/CashandcarriesApi.md#cashAndCarryAvailabilityGet) | **GET** /cashandcarries/products/availability | Get a Product Availability Info by the Esprinet or Customer product code for all the Cash And Carries
*CashandcarriesApi* | [**cashAndCarryAvailabilityGetByCash**](docs/CashandcarriesApi.md#cashAndCarryAvailabilityGetByCash) | **GET** /cashandcarries/{cashId}/products/availability | Get a Product Availability Info by the Esprinet or Customer product code for  the chosen Cash And Carry
*CashandcarriesApi* | [**cashAndCarryPricingGet**](docs/CashandcarriesApi.md#cashAndCarryPricingGet) | **GET** /cashandcarries/products/pricing | Get a Product Pricing Info by the Esprinet or Customer product code for all the Cash And Carries
*CashandcarriesApi* | [**cashAndCarryPricingGetByCash**](docs/CashandcarriesApi.md#cashAndCarryPricingGetByCash) | **GET** /cashandcarries/{cashId}/products/pricing | Get a Product Pricing Info by the Esprinet or Customer product code for  the chosen Cash And Carry
*CustomerDepotApi* | [**customerDepotDeliveryNotesGetById**](docs/CustomerDepotApi.md#customerDepotDeliveryNotesGetById) | **GET** /customerDepot/deliverynotes/{id} | Get the customer depot delivery note by Id
*CustomerDepotApi* | [**customerDepotDeliveryNotesSearch**](docs/CustomerDepotApi.md#customerDepotDeliveryNotesSearch) | **GET** /customerDepot/deliverynotes | Get all delivery notes of the customer depot
*CustomerDepotApi* | [**customerDepotOrdersGetById**](docs/CustomerDepotApi.md#customerDepotOrdersGetById) | **GET** /customerDepot/orders/{id} | Get the customer depot order by Id
*CustomerDepotApi* | [**customerDepotOrdersSearch**](docs/CustomerDepotApi.md#customerDepotOrdersSearch) | **GET** /customerDepot/orders | Get all orders of the customer depot.
*CustomerDepotApi* | [**customerDepotProductsGetById**](docs/CustomerDepotApi.md#customerDepotProductsGetById) | **GET** /customerDepot/products/{id} | Get the product of the customer with the given product Id stored in the Esprinet depot
*CustomerDepotApi* | [**customerDepotProductsGetByPage**](docs/CustomerDepotApi.md#customerDepotProductsGetByPage) | **GET** /customerDepot/products/all | Get all products of the customer stored in the Esprinet depot
*CustomerDepotApi* | [**customerDepotProductsSearch**](docs/CustomerDepotApi.md#customerDepotProductsSearch) | **GET** /customerDepot/products | Get the product of the customer with the given customer or esprinet product Id stored in the Esprinet depot
*CustomerDepotApi* | [**ordersPost**](docs/CustomerDepotApi.md#ordersPost) | **POST** /customerDepot/orders | Creates a new order containing the specified list of products into the Esprinet systems.
*CustomerQuotationsApi* | [**quotationGet**](docs/CustomerQuotationsApi.md#quotationGet) | **GET** /customerQuotations/{id} | Gets the quotation previously inserted by Id
*CustomerQuotationsApi* | [**quotationPost**](docs/CustomerQuotationsApi.md#quotationPost) | **POST** /customerQuotations | Creates a new quotation request containing the specified list of products into the Esprinet systems.
*DeliveryNotesApi* | [**deliveryNoteGet**](docs/DeliveryNotesApi.md#deliveryNoteGet) | **GET** /deliveryNotes/{id} | Get a Delivery Note By Document Number
*DeliveryNotesApi* | [**deliveryNotesSearchGet**](docs/DeliveryNotesApi.md#deliveryNotesSearchGet) | **GET** /deliveryNotes | Get a all the delivery notes by the inserted criterias
*LoginApi* | [**loginPost**](docs/LoginApi.md#loginPost) | **POST** /login | Performs the logon to the service.
*OrdersApi* | [**orderDelete**](docs/OrdersApi.md#orderDelete) | **DELETE** /orders/{id} | Delete the order with the given id
*OrdersApi* | [**orderGet**](docs/OrdersApi.md#orderGet) | **GET** /orders/{id} | Get an Order by the Order Id
*OrdersApi* | [**orderLinesDelete**](docs/OrdersApi.md#orderLinesDelete) | **DELETE** /orders/{orderId}/lines/{orderLineId} | Delete the order line with the given order line id of the given order
*OrdersApi* | [**orderPatch**](docs/OrdersApi.md#orderPatch) | **PATCH** /orders/{id} | Unlock the order with the given id
*OrdersApi* | [**orderPost**](docs/OrdersApi.md#orderPost) | **POST** /orders | Creates a new order containing the specified list of products into the Esprinet systems.
*OrdersApi* | [**orderPut**](docs/OrdersApi.md#orderPut) | **PUT** /orders/{id} | Modifies an already existing order into the Esprinet systems.
*OrdersApi* | [**orderTransactionsGetById**](docs/OrdersApi.md#orderTransactionsGetById) | **GET** /orders/transactions/{id} | Return the tracking transaction by the transaction id
*OrdersApi* | [**ordersSearchGet**](docs/OrdersApi.md#ordersSearchGet) | **GET** /orders | Obtains a list of orders, already existing into the Esprinet systems, satisfying the specified search criterias.  The search period should not exceed 30 days
*OrdersApi* | [**ordersSummaryGet**](docs/OrdersApi.md#ordersSummaryGet) | **GET** /orders/summary | Obtains a summary of orders satisfying the specified search criterias.  The search period should not exceed 30 days
*ProductsApi* | [**productsAvailabilityGet**](docs/ProductsApi.md#productsAvailabilityGet) | **GET** /products/availability | Get a Product Availability Info by the Esprinet or Customer product code
*ProductsApi* | [**productsPricingGet**](docs/ProductsApi.md#productsPricingGet) | **GET** /products/pricing | Get a Product Pricing Info by the Esprinet or Customer product code

## Documentation for Authorization

Authentication schemes defined for the API:
### Bearer

- **Type**: API key
- **API key parameter name**: Authorization
- **Location**: HTTP header


## Recommendation

It's recommended to create an instance of `ApiClient` per thread in a multithreaded environment to avoid any potential issues.
